installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# VoiceTwine Installation Script
# Server Files: /mnt/server

# Update system packages
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python3 python3-dev python3-pip libtool

echo "Updating npm to latest version..."
npm install -g npm@latest

# Ensure working directory
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Mark the directory as safe to avoid Git "dubious ownership" errors
git config --global --add safe.directory /mnt/server

# Clone or pull the GitHub repository
BRANCH="${BRANCH:-master}"

if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo "Directory is not empty."

    if [ -d .git ] && [ -f .git/config ]; then
        echo ".git directory found, checking remote..."
        git remote -v
        ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)

        if [ "$ORIGIN" == "$GIT_ADDRESS" ]; then
            echo "Correct repo, pulling latest changes..."
            git pull origin "$BRANCH"
        else
            echo "Different repo detected. (Current $ORIGIN, getting $GIT_ADDRESS) Exiting to prevent data loss."
            exit 10
        fi
    else
        echo "No .git folder, exiting to avoid overwriting manual files."
        exit 10
    fi
else
    echo "Directory is empty, cloning repo..."
    git clone --single-branch --branch "$BRANCH" "$GIT_ADDRESS" .
fi

# Install Node.js dependencies
if [ -f package.json ]; then
    echo "Installing npm dependencies..."
    npm install --omit=dev
    echo "Installing typescript and sequelize-cli..."
    npm install -g typescript sequelize-cli
else
    echo "package.json not found! Cannot install dependencies."
    exit 20
fi

# Build the TypeScript code
if [ -f tsconfig.json ]; then
    echo "Building TypeScript project..."
    npm run clean # Clean first in case we're updating!
    npm run build
else
    echo "tsconfig.json not found! Assuming pre-built or JavaScript project."
fi

echo "Running database migration..."
npx sequelize-cli db:migrate

echo "Installation complete."
exit 0
